Articles.Content: So I was looking at the kOS mod, and I was wondering.... Has anyone created a program for soft-landing the first stage of their rocket, Falcon 9R-style? Or would anyone be up for the challenge? I'm going to attempt it, but I'm certainly not the best so I was wondering if any of you pro's have done or attempted it. Or does the program stop running when it gets out of rendering distance?

Oh, that's really interesting!

I never used KOS, but for sure you have to use something that force your first stage to remain loaded and under physical simulation.

I don't remember the name, but such a plugin already exists.

Once the vessel is forced to remain loaded, the auto pilot would work even if you are not focusing it.
Thanks Plonio! I was thinking you would need a mod to force it to remain loaded... I'll keep trying with this, I'm sure with the new Career Updates it'll be a very useful thing to have!
